Name: Adjust Position Of PanelBarItems when PanelBar has no ScrollBar

ExampleInfo.Name: Adjust Position Of PanelBarItems when PanelBar has no ScrollBar

Description:
The example demonstrates an approach to customizing the RadPanelBarItems to include a ScrollBar when the RadPanelBar's
vertical ScrollBar is Disabled.

Triggers are used to set the proper ContentTemplate for the RadPanelBarItem, depending on the level they are on.

Margin of Header of SecondLevel items is removed (from 5 0 to 0), which requires a custom ControlTemplate
KeyWords: Adjust Position Of PanelBarItems when PanelBar has no ScrollBar,  panelbaritem, scrollbar, listbox

Name: Style second and higher level PanelBarItems to look like first level PanelBarItems

ExampleInfo.Name: Style second and higher level PanelBarItems to look like first level PanelBarItems

Description:
This example demonstrates an approach to styling PanelBar with more than two levels of PanelBarItems
and applying homogenous styling for all of the nested levels.

It makes use of triggers and the Level and HasItems properties of PanelBarItems
to define the appropriate ControlTemplate.
KeyWords: Style second and higher level PanelBarItems to look like first level PanelBarItems,  panelbaritem, hierarchy, secondlevel
